refnamediv.refpurpose: convert all NMG solids in a model to BoT solids

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: nmg-bot reads the in_file.g and whenever an NMG solid is encountered, it is converted to the BoT solid format and written to out_file.g. All other objects in in_file.g are copied to out_file.g unchanged. If the -v option is specified, then a message is displayed for each NMG converted to BoT format.

refsect1.title: DIAGNOSTICS
refsect1.para: Error messages are intended to be self-explanatory.
